title: GlowSerum Ultra - Comparison

products.key_ingredients: Vitamin C, Hyaluronic Acid, and Ferulic Acid

comparison_summary: GlowSerum Ultra is positioned as the premium option at 2500 INR, featuring a high-potency Vitamin C formulation enhanced by Hyaluronic and Ferulic Acids, specifically targeting dull and dry skin types. The generic competitor, Radiance Boost Serum, is more affordable at 1800 INR and contains a standard concentration of Vitamin C alongside Niacinamide, making it better suited for oily and combination skin. The main differentiators are the ingredient boosters, formulation potency, and price point.
